typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	FileName as string ("TNS_OUT_1_"),
	TimeStamp as string,
	FileExtension as string (".TCN"),
	FileName3 as string ("TNS_OUT_3_"),
	FileNameX as string ("TNCS_OUT_X_")
}
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> tncsource1
tncsource1 split(rlike(Column_1, '^01'),
	rlike(Column_1, '^03'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(dtsink1, dtsink2, dtsinkother)
ConditionalSplit1@dtsink1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'FileName[n]FileExtension',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@dtsink2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:(concat($FileName3, $FileExtension)),
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@dtsinkother sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:(concat($FileNameX, $FileExtension)),
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
